name: CrypticCrosswordHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask cryptic crossword helper what is meant by headless”
”Alexa, ask cryptic crossword helper what upwards is an indicator of”
”Alexa, ask cryptic crossword helper what are some hints for broken”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cryptic crossword helper
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ever find yourself baffled, befuddled, bewildered, discombobulated, stumped, stupefied, or just plain confused about what a cryptic crossword clue is actually telling you to do? Well, you're not the only one! Fortunately, you can use this app to help untangle the labyrinth of "crypticcrosswordese" that has evolved over the decades. From anagrams that mix your brain up, to concealed words that just won't come out of hiding, this app will help you to identify and learn the purpose of those devilish words that crossword compilers take such joy in using to confound us!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
